content: What last name starting with 'D' belongs to an influential British scientist whose theory of evolution changed our understanding of natural history?

I believe the answer you're looking for is Darwin. Charles Darwin was a British naturalist and biologist who is best known for his contributions to the science of evolution. His theory of evolution by natural selection, which he detailed in his book "On the Origin of Species," revolutionized our understanding of how species change over time and their relationships to one another. Darwin's work laid the foundation for modern evolutionary biology and has had a profound impact on various fields including genetics, anthropology, and ecology.
